name: Akkorokamui
description: Akkorokamui is a gargantuan celestial creature characterized by its impressive tentacles and healing abilities. Its massive form radiates a chaotic good aura and it features both natural armor and magical qualities.
memorable: Akkorokamui can detach parts of its tentacles to offer magical healing food, restoring significant health and curing afflictions.
goals: To protect and heal allies while imposing a formidable presence on the battlefield.
relations: Possible allies include other celestials, and it could be encountered alongside aquatic creatures due to its amphibious nature.
environment: Typically found in aquatic environments where it can utilize its swimming speed.
strengths: Resilient due to high HP and natural armor, able to regenerate health consistently, and offers magical healing through its unique Offering of Flesh ability.
weaknesses: Vulnerable to physical attacks when it is unable to regenerate.
attacks: Utilizes tentacle strikes in multiattack sequences, capable of substantial bludgeoning damage with a tentacle sweep that can knock opponents prone.
most_powerful_ability: The Offering of Flesh ability allows it to provide magical healing food that can cure ailments and regenerate limbs.
senses: Possesses blindsight up to 30 feet and a passive perception score of 19, providing exceptional awareness.
skills: Has proficiency in perception, contributing to its ability to discern its surroundings effectively.
additional_information: Immune to poison damage and cannot be poisoned.
Has legendary resistance to succeed on failed saving throws three times per day.
Magic resistance grants advantage on saving throws against spells.
Regenerates 15 HP at the start of its turn if it has at least 1 HP.
Acts as a Siege Monster, dealing double damage to objects and structures.
